title: List of all Android chat  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android chat  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: ChatKit
repoList.description: Android library. Flexible components for chat UI implementation with flexible possibilities for styling, customizing and data management.  Made by Stfalcon

repoList.name: ChatMessageView
repoList.description: Chat UI library for Android :zap:

repoList.name: springy-heads
repoList.description: Chat heads library for android

repoList.name: ChatMessageView
repoList.description: Android library to create chat message view easily

repoList.name: android-chat-ui
repoList.description: A messages UI library for Android

repoList.name: ChatView
repoList.description: This is an Android library which can be used to add chat functionality to your android application with just a few lines of code.

repoList.name: videochatguru-android
repoList.description: Open source library to create fast and beautiful video chats over WebRTC

repoList.name: bubbles-for-android
repoList.description: Bubbles for Android is an Android library to provide chat heads capabilities on your apps. With a fast way to integrate with your development.

repoList.name: MultiImageView
repoList.description: Android library to display a few images in one ImageView like avatar of group chat. Made by Stfalcon

repoList.name: android-chat-ui
repoList.description: Android Chat UI library.
